issue.title: Atlas v3 URDF has no collision models

content.html:
@patrickbeeson

I've found the culprit to rviz segfault in fuerte. The stl files that I resized manually with ivcon tool were ascii files. I've pushed in a fix so collisions load correctly in fuerte.

Visuals in fuerte are still scaled incorrectly though (see my attachment rviz_fuerte.png, where textured meshes are visuals, and red colored meshes are collision meshes).
